body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Stewart Motors. My name is Dylan Stewart, how can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Laura. Can you please provide me with your phone number and home address to assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three one, eight nine zero zero. And my home address is seven eight four, Elm Street, Apartment three two five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Laura. We appreciate your cooperation. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I'm feeling relieved now that I have reported the issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad I could help alleviate your concerns, Laura. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
